title: Support for HTML File Inputs in DApp Browser
body: ### User Story As a user, I want to be able to upload files in the DApp Browser. ### Description *Type*: Bug *Summary*: I have created a simple HTML file which has 3 types of file inputs (from simple to complex). I have had luck using the file inputs in various browsers (Trust, Toshi, Chrome, Safari, Firefox, etc.) however in Status they do nothing. **Here is the test HTML file:** https://hippocrates.medcredits.io/file-inputs.html #### Expected behavior The first one should simply pop open the file picker. The second should fire an alert() after you choose a file. The third should show the name of the file chosen in a span. #### Actual behavior Nothing happens. The button graphics depress when you touch down, but that's it. ### Reproduction - Open Status - Put https://hippocrates.medcredits.io/file-inputs.html in your DApp Browser's address bar - Press the various buttons. ### Solution *Summary*: -
